body.name: ARRISEA Smart Toilet with Bidet Built in, Foot Sensing Modern Toilet Bidet Combo with Auto Flush, Remote Control Warm Water, Elongated Heated Bidet Seat, Dryer, Built-in Water Tank, LED Light
features: 【TIPS】：ARRISEA modern smart toilet bidets -BP101(without auto lid) standard voltage:110/120V. There is USE MANUAL PDF File provided. You can download it on the detailed page.

【Four-Shortcut Key Design】: Rear-washing key, Front-washing key, Manually-flush key and Hot-wind key being on the left and right of the toilet seat. The Shortcut key design has reduced a lot of trouble in use for the elder and the patients.

【Various of Fountain Washing Modes】: Included Rear wash, Front wash, Constant temp washing, Lady care wash, Strong wash and Slipping-massage wash. To adjust water temperature, water pressure, dryer temperature and heat seat temperature with the remote control.

【LCD Screen & LED Nigh Light】:LCD digital display indicates the real-time water / seat temperature, easy to tell when the temp is right for you and safe for your family, helping avoid hot or cold surprises. The LED light adds a touch of modernity and functionality. It provides a gentle illumination during nighttime visits, eliminating the need to turn on harsh overhead lights.

【High-quality Ceramics】:Ceramics that have been calcined at high temperatures and glazed with micro-crystals can keep their color unchanged for a long time. The smooth glaze and pre-wet toilet wall technology prevents dirt from adhering, combined with powerful flushing to keep the toilet clean. Our products are certified by UL.
【Built-in Tank and Booster Pump】:The Large capacity Built-in Tank and Booster Pump can provide more stronger water pressure and deal with the water pressure problem on the remote region.

【Remote Control】: You will get a remote that comes with the one piece toilet in the carton. You can adjust the water temp and seat temp by the remote. And you can adjust the moving spout to fit your body.

【As safe as a standard toilet installation】: Due to the design of the built-in tank, it is not possible to use the standard toilet anchor bolts, but our unique anchor bolts design makes the toilet easy to install while ensuring safety. Most of all, this method prevents the sealing wax flange from being damaged and leaking by the anchor bolt like the regular installation.

【Incredible Service】: If you meet any problems, please contact us by the Amazon QA board, and we will reply to you as soon as possible within 6 hours. We promise to provide a 90-Day Money Back Guarantee and a 10 years Replacement Warranty.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Shortcut key is suitable for the elder and the patients ARRISEA smart one-piece toilet can be controlled by the shortcut key or remote control. As you can see, there are four shortcut key to use include of the Hip Cleaning key, Female Cleaning key, the Manual Flush key and the Warm air drying. In addition, you can control bo the water temperature, wind temperature and the sprayer position. Advantage: It is good for the old and the young to easy to use the smart toilet without learning manuals.

Self Clean---After retraction The modern smart one-piece toilet nozzles self-clean with every use, reducing bacterial growth for a healthier environment. Hip- Clean Independent nozzle for cleaning hip that provide adjustable nozzle position, and can be automatically retractable Female- Clean Independent nozzle for female washing that provide adjustable nozzle position, and can be automatically retractable

6-level Heated widen seat The smart toilets for bathrooms provided by ARRISEA have 6 levels adjustable seat temperature, so that you will not be afraid of the cold when you use the modern toilet with heated seats in winter. 6-level adjustable water temperature Our smart toilet wash has feminine wash, rear washing, and mobile wash with warm water allowing you to have a relaxed and natural toilet trip. Most of all, the nozzle's position can be adjustable. 6 level Adjustable Warm Wind The modern smart toilet bidet combo has 6-level adjustable air temperatures for a quick warm air dryer.

No need water pressure limit The smart toilet we developed has an innovative device that can achieve 0 water pressure flushing, no longer afraid of low water pressure use environment. Built-in Booster Pump ARRISEA Built-in Booster Pump can increase the water tank pressure. And make the ceramic wall to be cleanning. Double Siphonic flushing Technology Pioneering dual siphonic flushing technology, one startup will activate 2 siphonic flushes and double cleansing. One flush will create 2 siphons in toilet, emptying waste in toilet twice in a row to achieve no residual flushing, which can meet the first and second water efficiency requirements of national standard.

4.0 AI cpu ARRISEA 4.0 version Cpu can provide more quickly operation to keep the smart toilet working up to 10 years. High temperature sintered ceramics The ceramic bowl produced by high-temperature calcination can keep the color unchanged after long-term use. The microcrystalline glazing technology ensures smooth glaze, prevents the adhesion of dirt, and makes cleaning easier. ultraviolet radiator The automatic air deodorizer neutralizes bathroom odors by using filters, Effectively cleans the air around the smart toilet to create a more pleasant experience.
No leaking and IPX4 water proof UL Certification Built-in All the accessories

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good-quality, cleans and flushes perfectly, controls work great and easy to install too.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My old toilet broke, and I have always been interested in smart toilets. I found this one with really good specs and a great all-in-one design, and I had to get one. I was not disappointed; this one has worked out great. First off, very easy to install. I like how it came with everything to install and some high-tech seal; this one will never leak. I just followed the easy-to-understand instructions step-by-step, and I had it installed in roughly 30 minutes. Secondly, it works great. I like how easy this one is to use. The instruction manual was very easy to understand, and I could use the toilet almost immediately. I also like how easily the remote control works and how I can easily understand features/options. I also like to tweak the positions of the sprayer, the temperature of the water, and the air for drying right from the remote control for both myself and my girl. I also like how comfortable the seat is, it is always just the right temperature to sit down, and the lighting makes it easy to find at night. Lastly, I love the self-cleaning mode. After a few days, my old toilet always got a ring, and I knew it was time for cleaning. This one never gets the ring and always looks great. No cons, it worked out great for me, and I am very happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hubby Calls it A Transformer
reviews.reviewText: This smart toilet bidet will improve your bathroom experience! It is both technologically advanced and environmentally sensitive, making it ideal for individuals looking to improve their lifestyle while saving the planet. It combines comfort and cutting-edge technology to provide a great option for personal hygiene.This toilet exceeds what I was expecting. There are many washing modes to choose from, depending on what you need. I don't think anything was forgotten. This bidet was simple to install, but it needs both power and water connections to be set up and run.I enjoy how the seat heats up to keep my bottom warm on a chilly morning. This is futuristic, but it works well. It doesn't look like a toilet at all because there is no back. I chose the one that allows you to manually open and close the lid, but there is also an option that does it automatically.Using this allows me to foster sustainability by reducing the amount of paper I use. It has a remote, but I can also set it up to control it using my smartphone, which I always carry with me. This takes me from the Stone Age to the present day. I'm in love with this toilet, which is something I never expected to say. It's a little pricey, but it's well worth it, and guests usually ask where I got it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great toilet/bidet but have a few cons
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. First of all, this is overall a great toilet/bidet function. Pros:1. Both the toilet and the remote control look so sleek and modern.2. Fairly easy to install (note: will need to drill into floor, mine was a concrete slab so be prepare to get the tools to do that).3. Strong flushing suction4. Alot of adjustable temperature options for personalized comfort5. Seat is in great form and long time sitting on the toilet did not leave my legs falling asleep like my old standard toilet which is a huge pro in my book.Cons:1. The seating is plastic and may scratches easily so use soft material to clean. So if you use tough paper towels be prepare for it to scratch and loses its luster.2. Self cleaning mode doesn’t seem to work as intended…because water seems to be concentrated to the left of the spray head and not the entire thing when it is out. Maybe during the retracting phase it may clean more, but from the initial look of it, I don’t think the self cleaning function is working well. But overall everything looks clean so I’m not overly worried.3. Although it does UV sanitizing after every flush/use, it does not have sanitization button on the remote so there is no option to UV sanitize for a long time.4. Has two hole/gaps at the base of the cover to which splash back could enter which is going to be hard to clean (I’m not looking forward to that. Couple of cleaning options one is to clean with a cleaning agent but with a Qtip and the second option is to use sanitizing spray into the gaps but I don’t know how the metal part will hold up to the cleaning agents.Overall, it is a nice toilet, I just see the potential wear and tear of the toilet seating area which I see as irreversible since it doesn’t look like it can be replaced easily without removing the whole toilet. But overall, for the first week of owning both the sensor automatic lid closing and non-automatic lid closing, I am happy with the product. Will update this review after 6 months to a year or so if anything changes for the worst. But so far so good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We love everything about our new ARRISEA Smart Toilet with built in Bidet. It is very different than your standard toilet, so we had a plumber install it as part of our bathroom remodel. The night light function is very handy at night and heated seat and water are very much appreciated now that it is winter. The remote is very easy to use and allows you to customize the function settings. Ours has the self flush/clean which works great and keeps it very clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The plastic filter fails
reviews.reviewText: I finally get the plumber to install the smart toilet and the white plastic filter fails within 3 days. We noticed the plastic filter seems to have been used but we wanted to install this anyway because we wanted to use it. The failure is at the connection from the plastic filter to the 3/8 hose I believe that the size. But this hose and the filter are both parts of this toilet. I trust my plumber and this is a very easy connection. So it must be the used/faulty part.I would have given this at least 4 stars but then this is unusable now and I cannot find a replacement part in Home Depot.I need this fixed ASAP. How can that be done?
No se puede comprar si estás en méxico a menos que tengas padrón para importación NOM conagua
